options.name: Action : Mark Quarry
options.description: You designate a creature you can see as your quarry. You gain +1 dice on all senses and insight checks to track or gather information about your quarry. You also know the general direction and approximate distance to your quarry if they are within distant range. This mark lasts until the quarry is captured, killed, or you complete a full rest.

options.name: Relentless Pursuit
options.description: Gain +1 skill with wildcraft. You can track creatures across any natural terrain without penalty, and your movement is not slowed by difficult terrain while following a trail.

options.name: Urban Hunter
options.description: Gain +1 skill with insight. You excel at tracking quarry through cities and settlements. You can gather information about a person's whereabouts, associates, or habits by spending 2 hours networking in an urban area.

options.name: Prepared Hunter
options.description: You never go into a hunt unprepared. Gain +1 energy. At the start of each day, you can designate one type of creature (humanoid, beast, undead, etc.). You gain +1 dice on all attack rolls against creatures of that type until your next full rest.

options.name: Manhunter
options.description: You specialize in hunting intelligent prey. Gain +1 skill with throwing weapons. When fighting humanoids or creatures with intelligence comparable to humans, you deal +1 damage with all attacks.

options.name: Beast Hunter
options.description: You specialize in hunting wild creatures. Gain +1 skill with medicine. You can harvest valuable materials from slain beasts, gaining resources worth 50 gold per creature tier (minion=50, thrall=100, etc.).

options.name: Action : Capture Alive
options.description: You make a specialized non-lethal attack designed to incapacitate rather than kill. Make a weapon attack. If it hits, instead of dealing damage, the target must make a resilience check with DC equal to your attack result. On failure, they are stunned until the end of their next turn.

options.name: Reaction : Hunter's Reflexes
options.description: When your quarry moves away from you, you can immediately move up to your movement speed toward them without provoking reactions. You must end this movement closer to your quarry than when you started.

options.name: Trophy Collector
options.description: You collect trophies from your successful hunts that enhance your reputation and abilities. Each time you capture or kill a quarry of thrall tier or higher, gain +1 temporary resolve that lasts until your next full rest.

options.name: Master Tracker
options.description: You have achieved mastery in the art of the hunt. Gain +1 skill with complex ranged weapons. Your Mark Quarry ability now works at unlimited range, and you can sense if your quarry is still alive regardless of distance.
